text: Crossodactylus boulengeri is a frog. It lives in the Serra do Mar mountain range. It lives in SÃ£o Paulo and Rio de Janeiro in Brazil and in parts of Argentina. For some time, scientists thought this frog was the same frog as Crossodactylus dispar. In 2014, they found they really are two different species of frog. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Crossodactylus boulengeri
